name: Agent Grapple (itch)
description:
After being captured and tormented by a mysterious group of sentient robots, you awake in a strange lab of deadly obstacles. As if things couldn't be worse, you realize your hands have been severed and replaced with experimental tech! Using your newfound abilities, will you escape the lab alive?

Agent Grapple is a physics-based 3D platformer with an emphasis on grappling and solving puzzles. It will feature narrative elements such as dialogue and cutscenes (not currently present).

The current build is an early vertical slice that showcases the general vision of the game. Some notable features include:

  • 5 levels that introduce new mechanics and puzzles
  • The ability to lift and throw objects
  • The ability to grapple to and traverse designated surfaces
  • Lethal obstacles such as stomping blocks and turrets
  • In-game sound effects and controller haptics
  • Original visual artwork

We hope you enjoy this brief experience and greatly appreciate feedback. 

Should you experience bugs or have any suggestions, please make a submission via the in-game feedback form.
